availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Richard T. Harris (Lyon County, Kentucky, farmer.)

body.p: Lyon County, Kentucky, farmer. Virginia native. Married to Mary J. Rucker Harris. Father of John Harris, William Jaspar Harris, Thomas N. Harris, Joseph B. Harris, Silas D. Harris, and Frederick C. Harris. Farmer in Livingston County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Lyon County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Livingston County, p. 325A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lyon County, p. 680.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994046, Lyon County Births.
